**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 123 2.0 There are a few principles of ability construction that you'll want to keep in mind. Some guidance for specific types of abilities will come later, but these apply to everything.
  • Respect the action economy.
  • Make sure abilities are level appropriate.
  • Avoid “invisible” abilities.
name: Basics of Ability Design
